newsItem.headline: Arsenal preparing €70M+ bid for Diomande; PSG, Real Madrid also monitoring

newNews.reasoning: New transfer development: Arsenal now preparing substantial bid (€70M+), escalating beyond previous Chelsea/Man Utd interest. This is materially new information not in existing news items dated Feb 22.

newsItem.headline: Liverpool genuine top target after Guehi departure; strong Europa League form noted

newNews.reasoning: Confirms Liverpool's status elevation from 'monitoring with genuine intent' (Jan 16) to 'top target' post-Guehi. Reiterates Europa League stats (5 starts, 2 goals, 3 clean sheets, 67% aerial win rate) as supporting evidence. New framing of Liverpool's priority level.
